thread.section_title: Mosaic Weighted Blankets Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mosaic Weighted Blankets | mosaicweightedblankets.com
thread.title: Justwanttosleep
thread.title_full: Mosaic Weighted Blankets reviewed by Justwanttosleep

author: Justwanttosleep
title: Justwanttosleep
text:
I am very happy with my weighted blanket. It is calming, soothing, and I am having overall better sleep. I wake up less during the night. It helps keep my legs from being restless. The blanket is well made, and ever so luxurious! I bought a med, adult size and it covers me perfectly, even if I turn over. The only drawback is that it took about three weeks to reach me after I placed the order, and shipping cost over $20. Worth the wait, for sure, however, I have noticed other companies do offer free shipping
I do love my Mosaic blanket, and have recommended the company to others.
